MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Reflection.Assembly loadedAssembly) cil managed

Docs.param: An instance that represents the currently loaded assembly.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>.
Docs.permission: when invoked late-bound through mechanisms such as <xref:System.Type.InvokeMember%2A?displayProperty=fullName>. Associated enumeration: .

Docs.summary: Gets an <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> that represents the currently loaded assembly.
Docs.value: An instance of <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> that represents the currently loaded assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The value of this property is set by the common language runtime when the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad?displayProperty=fullName> event occurs.
